word_group.phrase: the sands of time are running out

bilingual.source: He was running under the hot sun.
He fell over when he was running.
She is a member of a running club.
bilingual.target: 她是跑步俱乐部的成员。

bilingual.source: So we started running a week ago.
bilingual.target: 所以我们一周前开始跑步。

list.abstract: 《running》，是Abi F Jones作词、作曲并演唱的歌曲，收录于2015年巨小奇大音乐与独立音乐人合作发布的拾音辑《特约演出》中。
《Running》是Dua Lipa演唱的一首歌曲，由Andrew Wyatt、Dua Lipa作曲，收录于Dua Lipa2018年10月19日发行的专辑《Dua Lipa》中。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't get embarrassed running next to Miss....
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就不怕跟喘气小姐跑步。

yingyinNormal.en: You also need a practice running. What if I practice eating today then practice running tomorrow? No, Daddy. You need to practice running now. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你应该去练习一下跑步才对。我今天练习吃意大利面，然后明天再练习跑步。不行，爸爸。你现在就应该开始练习跑步。噢。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you know, the reason that I didn't wanna go running with you is because, well you know the way that you run is a little...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我之所以不想跟你跑步，是因为，你跑步的姿势有点…

yingyinNormal.en: Have you been running? No. It's just a suspicion I have.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你去跑步了？没有，这只是我的怀疑。

yingyinNormal.en: I am quiet good at running. It's not running, Daddy. It's a sack race. Oh. You have to get in the bag, and jump over there as fast as you can. Right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我非常擅长跑步。这不是跑步，爸爸，这个是跳麻袋比赛。哦。你们需要在袋子里，然后用最快的速度跳过去。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you run on it? Watch this. Pedro likes running around having fun. Everybody likes running around having fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那跑步没问题吗？你们看好了！佩德罗喜欢快乐的跑来跑去。大家都喜欢快乐的跑来跑去。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. So, what's new in your life? Well, my new shoes are not made for running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。那你最近有啥新鲜事儿吗？我的新鞋不适合跑步。

yingyinNormal.en: So are you sorry that I told them? No. It's been a long time since your dad and I went running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你后悔我告诉他们吗？不，我跟你爸好久没去跑步了。

yingyinNormal.en: But Daddy, you can hardly run at all. Nonsense. I am an expert at running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是爸爸，你根本就跑不动，不是吗。别胡说！我可是很擅长跑步的！

yingyinNormal.en: I spend time with my family. And I go to the pub. I watch TV. I, oh, I watch Patrick running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我跟家人在一起，去酒吧或者看电视，还有看帕特里克跑步。

yingyinNormal.en: And think of all the things you couldn't do. No more running, no more cycling, no more sex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想想所有你没法做的事情，不能跑步，不能骑车，还不能做爱。

yingyinNormal.en: But no, okay. No, no, I can see why running with me would be embarrassing to you. Yeah, okay. You're uptight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是好吧，难怪你会觉得跟我跑步很尴尬，你很保守。

yingyinNormal.en: What? To jump in a puddle, I must think like a puddle. Do you need to do running? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么。要想跳好泥坑，我就要先向泥坑一样思考。爸爸你需要练习跑步吗。不。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you do at the gym? Running, jumping and skipping. Mummy, that's not work. That's play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在健身房里干什么呢？跑步，跳高，还有跳绳。妈妈，你这可不算是工作，你这是在玩儿。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you do at the gym? Running, jumping and skipping. Mummy, that's not work. That's play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在健身房里干什么呢？跑步，跳高，还有跳绳。妈妈，你这可不算是工作，你这是在玩儿。

yingyinNormal.en: There are champions for running, jumping, I wish you were in the book, daddy. I am in the book. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里面的冠军有跳高的跑步的游泳的。真希望这里有你呢，爸爸。这里面真的有我。真的吗。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't need a destination when you're running on an omnidirectional treadmill with quadraphonic, pressure-sensitive underlay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要你脚下有一台四声道压敏底垫全方位跑步机你就可以随时出发。

yingyinNormal.en: He told me. Running mate. Oh, not just running mate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说了，竞选伙伴。不只是竞选伙伴。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not running, Mr. Castro.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会参选，卡斯特罗先生。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no "mine." I'm not running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没什么"我的" ，我不会参选。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: This should form part of a wider package of measures to address the long-<highlight>running</highlight> problems on Britain's railways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这应该成为解决英国铁路长期问题的更广泛系列措施的一部分。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 跑动者；走私者；滑行装置；滑道；滑槽；冰刀；蔓；长匐茎；纤匐枝；长条地毯；回转磨石；上磨盘；警官；青鲹

sense_info_list.en: running is the activity of moving fast on foot,especially as a sport

examination_example.sentence: However, the precise effects vary according to whether you engage in short, fast <highlight>running</highlight> or long-distance <highlight>running</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，精确的效果根据你是从事短跑、快跑还是长跑而有所不同。

examination_example.sentence: The claim was based on a new review of studies about the effects of <highlight>running</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一说法是基于一项新的关于跑步影响的研究综述。

examination_example.sentence: What is one effect that <highlight>running</highlight> has on people according to recent research?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 依据最近的研究，跑步对人有什么影响？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 跑步; 奔跑; 赛跑

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>running</highlight> groups have <highlight>running</highlight> competitions every Wednesday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跑步团体每周三都有跑步比赛。

examination_example.sentence: It is reported that thousands of <highlight>running</highlight> friends from 25 countries took part in 2019 Nanjing Jiangning Marathon．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据悉，来自25个国家的数千名跑友参加了2019南京江宁马拉松比赛。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Running</highlight> is the best exercise, because you're moving your whole body.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跑步是最好的运动，因为你在活动你的整个身体。

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly, I saw Wyatt sit down between two rocks in the <highlight>running</highlight> water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然，我看见Wyatt坐在流水中的两块石头之间。

examination_example.sentence: In those days, it was hard to find <highlight>running</highlight> water and shops where to buy things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那个年代，很难找到自来水和能买到东西的商店。

examination_example.sentence: Then he sat down and added a <highlight>running</highlight> obbligato (伴奏).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他坐下来，并添上了一段连续的伴奏。
